Title: Web Video Blueprint
Description: The Web Video Blueprint is an architecture blueprint (to be published as a Microsoft White Paper) and reusable code (this Codeplex project) for Web video services. This Codeplex project is a Silverlight 2 client supporting live/catch-up TV, VoD services & in-stream advertising.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Web Video Blueprint is an architecture blueprint (to be published as a Microsoft White Paper) and reusable code (this Codeplex project) for Web video services. This Codeplex project is a Silverlight 2 client supporting live/catch-up TV, VoD services & in-stream advertising.

The project needs to be updated in Silverlight 2.0 RTW - We also need to refine UI pieces - this is unfortunatly delaying the project release.
